title: News24.com | Lockdown: Over 10 000 people arrested in KZN for flouting regulations - Zikalala
description: More than 10 000 people have been arrested for various contraventions of the national lockdown since it began on 27 March, KwaZulu-Natal Premier Sihle Zikalala has said.
content:
More than 10 000 people have been arrested for various contraventions of the national lockdown since it began on 27 March, KwaZulu-Natal Premier Sihle Zikalala said on Monday.
"There are more than 10 000 in KwaZulu-Natal. People are charged. This is not just… [+2165 chars]
